name: Extra Investiture Points
source: Heroes of the High Court pg. 23
text: Whatever power has invested you to guide your destiny has instilled you with additional energy.
special: You can take Extra Investiture Points multiple times. The effects stack.
text_zh: 无论是何种力量指引你走向天命，它都为你提供了额外的能量。
special_zh: 你能多次选择该专长，其效果累计。
